Name: Adult Puzzles - Hentai NightClub
About the game: Challenging jigsaw and sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring hentai girls in a nightclub. Relaxing background music to match the theme and mood. Features: 2 game modes: Jigsaw or Sliding Puzzle 12 different puzzles to solve 3 levels of difficulty for sliding puzzles: 3x3, 4x4 and 5x5 Timer, to see how long it takes to solve a puzzle Gallery where you can view all the puzzle images you have solved. Be among our most engaged players to achieve a top spot in our Leaderboards and unlock various achievements.
